text: Remember the Day is a 1941 American romantic drama movie directed by Henry King and based on the play of the same name by Phillip Dunning and Philo Higley. It stars John Payne, Claudette Colbert, Shepperd Strudwick, Ann E. Todd, Douglas Croft and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1941 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Henry King Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Indiana
title: Remember the Day
